name: Dead Horizon
description: Most people never get a shot at making a difference. If you did... would you miss? -- Dead Horizon is a short and dirty point and click western themed adventure game that's also completely free.
minimum_requirements: OS: Almost any Processor: Toaster Memory: 00 MB RAM Graphics: Some kind of card Storage: 112 MB available space Sound Card: Preferably one that produces sound. Additional Notes: Anything that can run unity should be able to run this.
